summary: Validated PlanningHeader component integration in App.js. All 6 features tested and working correctly on both desktop and mobile.

issues: Repeated 'Date aujourd'hui pour Actualités' logs (12x per render) - minor performance concern (existing issue from previous iterations)

critical_code_review_comments: PlanningHeader component is now successfully integrated in App.js (line 24: import PlanningHeader from './components/planning/PlanningHeader')
Component displays gradient header with view mode buttons (Jour/Semaine/Mois)
All view mode transitions work correctly via setViewMode prop
Mobile responsive design is working well - buttons wrap properly on smaller screens
seed_data_creation: None - using existing admin user (Francis LEBLOND - Super-Admin)
context_for_next_testing_agent: PlanningHeader component now fully integrated in App.js. All Planning views (Jour/Semaine/Mois) working correctly with role filters in Semaine view. Mobile responsive design validated.

login.details: Login works with directeur@cabinet.fr / admin123 - logs in as Francis LEBLOND (Super-Admin)

planning_header_integration.details: PlanningHeader component successfully integrated - 'Planning Interactif' header displays with gradient (from-[#0091B9] via-[#007494] to-[#19CD91])

vue_jour.details: Jour view works correctly - displays date header, Matin/Après-midi sections with Plan du Cabinet

vue_semaine.details: Semaine view works correctly - displays weekly grid with role filters (Tous, Médecins, Assistants, Secrétaires)

vue_mois.details: Mois view works correctly - displays monthly calendar with Matin/Après-midi slots for each day

mobile_responsive.details: All views responsive on mobile (390x844) - PlanningHeader gradient visible, view buttons wrap correctly, all views display properly

mocked_apis.note: All tested APIs are real integrations - no mocked endpoints
